name: E-Commerce Platform
description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with payment integration, admin dashboard, real-time inventory management, and customer analytics.
longDescription: A comprehensive e-commerce platform built with modern technologies. Features include product management, shopping cart, checkout process with Stripe integration, order tracking, admin dashboard with analytics, and email notifications.

name: AI Chat Application
description: Real-time chat application with AI-powered responses, file sharing, and group conversations using OpenAI GPT.
longDescription: An intelligent chat application that combines real-time messaging with AI capabilities. Users can chat with AI assistants, share files, create groups, and get smart suggestions.

name: Portfolio Dashboard
description: Analytics dashboard for tracking portfolio performance with interactive charts, real-time data, and customizable widgets.
longDescription: A beautiful and functional dashboard for tracking investment portfolios. Features real-time stock data, interactive charts, portfolio analysis, and performance metrics.

name: Task Management App
description: Collaborative task management with drag-and-drop, real-time updates, team chat, and project timelines.
longDescription: A comprehensive project management tool designed for teams. Features include kanban boards, task assignments, time tracking, team collaboration, and reporting.

name: Weather Forecast App
description: Beautiful weather app with 7-day forecast, location search, weather maps, and severe weather alerts.
longDescription: A modern weather application providing accurate forecasts and weather information. Features include current conditions, hourly and daily forecasts, weather maps, and notifications.
